original_text: So Gideon took ten of his servants, and he did what the Lord had said. He was afraid of the people in his father's family and the men of the town. So he did this at night, not in the day.
korean_text: 이에 기드온이 종 열 사람을 데리고 여호와께서 그에게 말씀하신 대로 행하되 그의 아버지의 가문과 그 성읍 사람들을 두려워하므로 이 일을 감히 낮에 행하지 못하고 밤에 행하니라

sentences.original_text: So Gideon took ten of his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 기드온은 그의 종 열 명을 데리고

sentences.original_text: and he did what the Lord had said
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 주께서 말씀하신 것을 행했다

sentences.original_text: He was afraid of the people in his father's family
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 아버지 가족의 사람들을 두려워했다

sentences.original_text: and the men of the town
So he did this at night
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 밤에 이 일을 했다
